mapper.sql: id , prh_date, prh_number, prh_pur_order, prh_supname, prh_returnsup, prh_total_amount, prh_refund_amount, prh_outgoing_warehouse, prh_bill, prh_jindate, prh_maney_hu, prh_experienced_person, prh_single_person, ph_other_expenses, prh_outgoing_state, prh_remarks
mapper.select: select from purchase_return_history where prh_number like concat('%', #{purchaseReturnHistory.prhNumber}, '%') order by id desc;
